code: import{SET_VISIBILITY_FILTER}from'../constants/ActionTypes';import{SHOW_ALL}from'../constants/TodoFilters';var visibilityFilter=function visibilityFilter(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:SHOW_ALL;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_VISIBILITY_FILTER:return action.filter;default:return state;}};export default visibilityFilter;
